desc: Leni for You is a group composed of student, faculty, staff, administrator, and parent volunteers from Ateneo dedicated to campaigning for VP Leni Robredo's 2022 presidential run. #LabanLeni2022

layout.text: Leni for You Store - Merchandise for VP Leni Robredo

Hello, mga kakampinks! Leni for You is a group composed of student, faculty, staff, administrator, and parent volunteers from Ateneo dedicated to campaigning for VP Leni Robredo! Proceeds are dedicated to holding lugawans and distributing materials to partner communities! Going Christmas shopping? If buying 15pcs of an item above, kindly chat us or email at merch.leniforyou@gmail.com for special discounts and bulk prices :) #LabanLeni2022
